name: Water Sort Puzzle Sorting Game
description:
Water Sort Puzzle is a funny, interesting and addictive game.
Quickly arrange the watercolors in the tubes until each tube is filled with water of the same color.
A wonderful and challenging game to train your brain!”


HOW TO PLAY:

• You will win when you successfully arrange the water in each tube with the same color.
• Touch any tube to pour the top portion of water into another tube.
* You can only pour water into one tube if the water is of the same color and the tube has room to fill
• If you get stuck, you can add one more tube to make it easier.
* You can choose to replay the current level at any time!


FUNCTIONS:

• Totally free and easy to play
• Easy to play game with only 1 finger.
• Unlimited time!
• Unlimited levels!
• Able to play game in offline mode, no network connection required.
• Fun and addictive game!
• A great game to kill time and train your brain

Water Sort Puzzle is a great game for the whole family to play together.
